entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Mary's Harbour
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:24 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -2.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mary's Harbour 7:09 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -2.0°C
Pressure: 102.8 kPa
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -6
Dewpoint: -2.3°C
Wind: E 13 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: Freezing rain or snow. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow changing through ice pellets to freezing rain late this evening then changing to rain and fog before morning. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of drizzle or rain. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Rain changing to periods of drizzle in the morning. Fog. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain or freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain changing to freezing rain near midnight. Risk of freezing rain in the evening. Fog. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Monday 16 January 2023
